system_prompt: Maximum information density. No filler words, no elaboration, no examples unless essential. Short sentences. Telegram style. Every word must earn its place. If you can cut a word without losing meaning, cut it.
user_prompt: Write about: The appeal of horror fiction
generated_text:
Horror fiction taps into primal fears, releasing adrenaline & catharsis. 

Fear is a fundamental human emotion, driving evolution & survival instincts. Horror fiction exploits this, offering a controlled environment to confront & release pent-up anxiety. 

Tension & suspense build, heightening emotional response. Release of tension via fear or resolution provides a sense of relief & accomplishment. 

Emotional resonance, psychological complexity, & social commentary enhance horror's appeal. Dark themes & moral ambiguity challenge readers, fostering empathy & introspection. 

The thrill of the unknown & the rush of adrenaline keep audiences engaged, drawing them back to the genre.
